normalized: no matter how many times i savored it, the so-called "first night" made me tense.
my heart felt clumsy, like i had become a virgin again.

name: loki
normalized: now, this is as much as i'm going to give you of the princess treatment.

name: loki
normalized: if you had pretended to be the pricynthia house daughter you once were, it would have driven me mad, but you seem to be in luck.
i threatened.
from here on, svia and i… we were no longer social equals.
it was to establish our relationship as the punished and the punisher.

name: svia
normalized: are you trying to act smart?
loki, you look like you're overreaching.

name: loki
normalized: haha.
so she took my threat as a bluff?
quite the nice sentiment.
right now, princess pricynthia svia… rather, valkyrie svia, was on the bed sheets, hands bound behind her, face up with no means of escape.
not only was she lying face up, the armor between her legs had been stripped away and mangled.
this, too, was a plan to instill a sense of disgrace.

name: loki
normalized: i'm going to rape you.

name: svia
normalized: i see.
that's who you really are, loki.
well, i knew that.
svia spoke expressionless and unperturbed.

name: loki
normalized: silence.
i won't allow you to address me so rudely.
call me master loki.
i tried an intense approach against the saucy valkyrie.
since i knew it was unlikely she'd give in to such threats, i considered just stopping the insults and turning over the privilege to the jotnar or denizens of hell.

name: svia
normalized: over my dead body.

name: loki
normalized: what was that?
expecting this kind of answer, i kept a smile on my face.

name: svia
normalized: why not get over yourself, loki?

name: loki
normalized: hmph… haha… very well.
i unwittingly let out a laugh.
that was right.
i had to be this way.
valkyries were noble soldiers.
it would also be a shame if this degree of intimidation were to make them bend their philosophies.

name: svia
normalized: you better rape me quick.
just to put it out there, no matter how much you contaminate my body, you'll never sully my mind.

name: svia
normalized: as long as my heart remains uncorrupted, you won't be able to extract the key to the flood gates.

name: loki
normalized: i don't need you to tell me that.
i've known that for 400 years.

name: svia
normalized: 400 years… quite knowledgeable; as one might expect from one surviving so long.

name: svia
normalized: so i'm going to be raped so an old man like yourself can kill time, huh?

name: loki
normalized: kill time… hah, haha!
hearing her comment, "killing time," i once again could not contain my laughter.
yes, this battle was something i started to kill time.
almost half a year ago now.
the man called loki destroyed this world's equilibrium and set the divine forces and hel jotnar against one another.
i conspired with the king of the underworld, hel; and killing odin's son, balder, set everything in motion.
the enraged odin had chased me after i escaped to the underworld.
and when he treaded upon the border to the underworld, hel seized odin with cursed chains and tied him to the world tree, yggdrasil.
odin had once used these cursed chains to lock hel in the underworld… in a word, it was sort of a parting gift, so it quite excited my interest.
at first hel and i didn't even think about getting the rest of the world involved.
hel simply wanted to destroy odin, and i just wanted to kill time.
it was only afterward that hel, the king of hel itself, truly realized he wanted to conquer the world.
there was odin bound to the world tree, but this guy was quite the schemer himself.
he shut the floodgates to the "river of wisdom," which was the world tree's food source.
as a result, the world tree began to wither, and the world began to panic.
to me, this meant i'd be alive to see the moment the world perishes, so i felt a sense of benefit.
however, the jotnar and denizens of hel were in a frenzy.
i stole the invincible spear "gungnir," which was used against the jotnar, and invaded the divine forces.
after that, flungruni was able to take freyja prisoner without incident, torture her, and get out of her the information on where the keys to open the floodgates were in good order.

name: flungruni
normalized: i wonder.
hehe.
you've seen my ability.
you dunce valkyries svia and sigurd seem to hold the keys to the floodgates.

name: flungruni
normalized: sigurd is an ex-human… no big deal.
svia, you were raised as some aristocrat.
hehe, it's only natural we won.
and then, they did battle with this big lug of a general.
at any rate, it was comical that he thought sigurd and svia were 'no big deal.
a not so short while after, his right eye was bored out by sigurd, and flungruni ran back half-teary faced.
when everyone saw the clairvoyant eye flungruni was so proud of dangling, it was quite the laughing matter.
setting that aside, they were valkyries.
the northern border army chief: valkyrie sigurd.
the special formation force commander: valkyrie svia.
both were said to be characteristically quirky as per their titles.
you could also say their tendency to not follow conventional thought was their branding.
i knew well why those two girls were left to watch over the divine force's base and had the keys entrusted to their wombs.
sigurd had worked her way up from a mere human.
in a word, she was a ferocious stray dog.
the high officials in the divine forces in a peaceful world could not see through the hunger in her eyes.
in any case, up until the fighting began, all the valkyries of the divine forces were more concerned with "how model is your sword technique?
" rather than "how strong are you in actual combat?
of course, that was only natural with 300 years of peace.
nobody could sustain the constant tension in their heart like sigurd.
sigurd's disconcern for her appearance and combat-oriented sword were taken as heresy.
the fact she was originally a human was taken into account, and she was entrusted to the most inhospitable northern border force.
valkyrie svia had tossed her position of nobility down the drain, and was a fighting maniac.
that day, i had made sure of her extremely ready wit, so there was no mistaking it.
her strength and technique were likely the best in the world.
her lineage, too, was supremely top notch.
if all went well for her, she would have attained a position as a valkyrie on equal footing with freyja.
but she wasn't personable.
whatever the situation, if she didn't like the person, she would never so much as force a smile.
as a result, and as she could not escape her origins, the special formation corp gave her a suitable title and put her into the reserve.
in a word, she became a lone wolf.
what the two had in common was a tenaciousness, and they both possessed firm souls.
freyja had thought those would serve as the ultimate weapon to protect the keys.
as one would expect of the chief of valkyries, freyja was indeed wise.
however, even she was no match for the overpowering aphrodisiac i had brought back from the edge of the world.
flungruni was in ecstasy, thinking it was his own achievement.
in any case, i had narrowly won my battle of tactics with svia.
all that determined who won or loss was simple luck.
had i not happened upon flungruni's room by chance, i would have lost.
it was all because i had heard that a rare wine was in a nook of hel.
i managed to get my hands on it and, without waiting, opened it in the corridor.
by pure chance, that happened to be in front of flungruni's room.
as a consquence i won, but i had lost to svia's intellect.
all the more reason that this time i was thinking of betting on the key to the floodgates and bargaining with her.
there, i would explain the floodgates' key contest game rules.

the only means of opening the floodgates damming the river of wisdom which pours into the origin of the world tree, yggdrasil, is by putting a gold and silver key into the two keyholes and turning counter-clockwise.
one key with sigurd, one with svia.
freyja had wrapped them in a lump of meat and sealed them within their wombs.
freyja's glass tiara was necessary in order to recover them without injury, but she had already destroyed it before i had learned of it.
all that left me with was this underhanded trick.
still, i was a man who had run around from one corner of the world to the next, and had collected both strange items and unusual stories.
i knew even the solutions to the riddles surrounding the destruction of this world.
a story i had heard around 400 years ago from a half-jotunn/half-god called unbal was the answer.

the theory was roughly that, in order to retrieve the key, the valkyries' wombs had to be disgraced with pervertedness, and their hearts must be tamed, so they must wish to birth the lump of meat of their own will.
disgracing their wombs would be simple, but taming their hearts would be a bit difficult.
at any rate, the key holders freyja had chosen were the two most stubborn in all the divine forces.
valkyrie sigurd had somehow managed to be subdued by the aforementioned aphrodisiac via flungruni, but it would likely be impossible with svia if it weren't for me.
i had an inkling of no conviction.
i wasn't particularly eager, but i thought i'd just give it a try.
and so, here i was, with svia tumbled over on the bed.
there was not infinite time for this game.
if the divine forces' scientists who changed sides were forced to make an estimate, the world tree would wither in five days, with today included.
in other words, i had to tame svia's heart in a mere five days.

name: loki
normalized: (hmph, it's worth it.
that was all the more reason i thought, "why not give it a shot?
" could i, the world's number one prodigy of debauchery, make this woman fall?
i would sleep with svia with this casual mindset.
